name: SPACIOUS RAMBLA CATALUÑA
locationDesc: Spacious Rambla Cataluña s is located in the city center area, has 130 m ² and is in the 2nd floor in a building with lift . The lines Bus, Train and Metro (L5 and L3) are located just a few meters away.  This apartment can lodge up to 5 persons in
spaceDesc: Spacious Rambla Cataluña s is located in the city center area, has 130 m ² and is in the 2nd floor in a building with lift . The lines Bus, Train and Metro (L5 and L3) are located just a few meters away.  This apartment can lodge up to 5 persons in 3 bedrooms: Bedroom 1: 1 single bed (1 people) Bedroom 2: 2 single beds (2 people) Bedroom 3: 1 single beds (1 person) Bedroom 4: 1 single beds (1 person) It has 2 complete bathrooms. The kitchen is equipped with wash machine, dish washer, microwave, coffee machine, oven, icebox and freezer and kettle. For your comfort, the apartment has TV, hairdryer, fans/ aircon, heating and Internet.

host.name: Celia
host.about: I'm 39 years old living inBarcelona. My mother and I live right near Blue Barcelona condos that we rent out all year. We take pride in our properties and are responsive to any of our renters needs. Since we are local, we deal with our guests directly – from key exchanges, to cleaning, to repairs, and anything in between. All of our properties are fully furnished and have all the amenities of home!

reviews.txt: Very large house, cozy and bright. Celia is helpful and friendly, the house is not very far removed from the Metro to the bus stop, about 10 minutes walk.
